description: A full-stack contest management platform that enables users to create, explore, and participate in creative contests with secure authentication, role-based access, and a fully responsive modern interface.
A full-stack MERN food-sharing platform that enables users to donate surplus food, browse community listings, and request items through a secure, responsive single-page application.
A Frontend plant care and eco-lifestyle web application featuring secure authentication,responsive , protected routes, and dynamic data rendering within a clean, calming single-page interface.
